alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Geary; Morris; Riley; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:38PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dickinson, Geary, southeastern Riley, northern Morris and west central Wabaunsee Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong outflow boundary along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Ogden to 6 miles southeast of Chapman to 3 miles northeast of Gypsum. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 732 pm, trained spotters reported winds gusts of 50 mph along the outflow boundary. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Junction City, Herington, Alma, Ogden, Grandview Plaza, White City, Alta Vista, Hope, Dwight, Woodbine, Parkerville, Carlton, Latimer and Volland. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 295 and 318. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
